segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a small, two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet where I can clearly see a 'COOKIE JAR.'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture is precarious, though; the stool looks very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted backward, and its legs are splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how close it is to tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, too, her arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely focused on their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself trying to grab those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how bold children can be when they think no one is watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
